languages.text: "Сакральное гадание на костях и жилах мученика указало путь к реакторной. Это правда. Своими глазами узрела я акт предательства. Это тоже правда".
"The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."
languages.original_text: "Сакральное гадание на костях и жилах мученика указало путь к реакторной. Это правда. Своими глазами узрела я акт предательства. Это тоже правда".

traits.locale_text: "Sacred haruspication from the bones and sinews of a martyr pointed the way to the reactor room. It is true. I beheld the treacherous act with my own eyes. That is true as well."
"Sacred haruspication from the bones and sinews of a martyr pointed the way to the reactor room. It is true. I beheld the treacherous act with my own eyes. That is true as well."
"The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."
"The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."
"The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."
"The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."

languages.text: « Un rituel de divination sacrée réalisé avec les ossements et les tendons d'un martyr nous a menés jusqu'à la salle du réacteur. Je l'admets. Mais il est également vrai que j'ai vu l'acte de trahison de mes propres yeux. »
languages.original_text: "The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."

traits.locale_text: « Un rituel de divination sacrée réalisé avec les ossements et les tendons d'un martyr nous a menés jusqu'à la salle du réacteur. Je l'admets. Mais il est également vrai que j'ai vu l'acte de trahison de mes propres yeux. »

languages.text: «La práctica de la adivinación sagrada con los huesos y nervios de un mártir nos llevó a la sala del reactor. Eso es cierto. Pero también es cierto que fui testigo del acto de traición con mis propios ojos».
languages.original_text: "The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."

traits.locale_text: «La práctica de la adivinación sagrada con los huesos y nervios de un mártir nos llevó a la sala del reactor. Eso es cierto. Pero también es cierto que fui testigo del acto de traición con mis propios ojos».

languages.text: “我通过殉道者的骨头与肌腱进行了神圣的占卜，由此来到了反应堆室，这是真的。不过，我也确实亲眼目睹了这桩背信弃义的恶行。”
languages.original_text: "The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."

traits.locale_text: “我通过殉道者的骨头与肌腱进行了神圣的占卜，由此来到了反应堆室，这是真的。不过，我也确实亲眼目睹了这桩背信弃义的恶行。”

languages.text: 「殉教者の骨と筋を使った神聖な占いの実践が、私たちを原子炉室に導いたのです。これは事実です。しかし、私がこの目で裏切り行為を目撃したこともまた事実です」
languages.original_text: "The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."

traits.locale_text: 「殉教者の骨と筋を使った神聖な占いの実践が、私たちを原子炉室に導いたのです。これは事実です。しかし、私がこの目で裏切り行為を目撃したこともまた事実です」

languages.text: "Die Praxis der heiligen Prophetie mit Hilfe der Knochen und Sehnen eines Märtyrers hat uns in den Reaktorraum geführt. Das ist wahr. Doch es ist auch wahr, dass ich den Akt des Verrats mit meinen eigenen Augen gesehen habe."
languages.original_text: "The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."

traits.locale_text: "Die Praxis der heiligen Prophetie mit Hilfe der Knochen und Sehnen eines Märtyrers hat uns in den Reaktorraum geführt. Das ist wahr. Doch es ist auch wahr, dass ich den Akt des Verrats mit meinen eigenen Augen gesehen habe."

languages.text: "Bir şehidin kemiklerini ve tendonlarını kullanarak yapılan kutsal kehanet yöntemi, bizi reaktör odasına yönlendirdi. Ancak ihanet girişimini kendi gözlerimle gördüğüm de doğru."
languages.original_text: "The practice of sacred divination using the bones and sinews of a martyr led us to the reactor room. This is true. But it is also true that I beheld the act of treachery with my own eyes."
